text: Lee So-dam (; born 12 October 1994) is a South Korean footballer who plays as a midfielder for Hyundai Steel Red Angels and the South Korean national team. ==Club career== Lee joined Incheon Hyundai Steel Red Angels before the start of the 2018 season. ==Internatioanl goals== {| class="wikitable" :Scores and results list South Korea's goal tally first. |- ! title: Lee So-dam
